channel.title: Testing on Anthony Galea
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Anthony Galea

item.title: An Introduction to Load Testing with Gatling
item.description: Many developers are familiar with the Apache JMeter or Apache Bench tools for writing load tests. Gatling is an alternative tool which provides: a concise Scala DSL in order to Describe a Load Test a simple means to Run a Simulation a nice html Report with all the results Report Let’s start by looking at the typical output of a Gatling load test.
